function.name: length
function.short: Length of vector or length of longest array dimension.

long.para: length(x) returns the value of the length of the argument, x.

examples.precode:
>> clifford_signature(1,1) >> x = randm
x =
- 0.1164 e0 - 0.0734 e1 - 0.6395 e2 - 0.7563 e12
>> length(x)
ans =
1
>> y = randm(2,3)
y =
2x3 Cl(1,1) multivector array
>> length(y)
ans =
3
